TITLE.P: Physiotherapy and Rehabilitation Items and Support

SHORT_DESCR.P: Team Leidos would like to make interested suppliers aware that it intends to invite tenders for its Physiotherapy items and support requirement later this year, with a view to award contracts that will commence in early 2019.
The Physio requirement is to cover the future need in terms of items, capital equipment and support.
There are an estimated 700 different consumables and 24 types of capital equipment.
Team Leidos require these to be shipped to medical centres throughout the UK and to our main operational distribution hub in Donnington, Telford.

Team Leidos wishes to stimulate interest, information and views across the market for the supply of this requirement via this Request for information (RFI) together with other companies whom Leidos believes may be able to provide useful intelligence on our requirement.
Please request a Microsoft Word version of the questionnaire from the named contact in this bulletin.
Team Leidos is seeking supplier’s feedback on capabilities and would be grateful if you could answer the following questions:
I- Company information
Name of the company:
Address:
Account manager contact (email and phone):
II- Consumable products.
Please confirm if you supply the following:
1.0- Braces and supports for Upper Limb
2.0- Braces and supports for Lower limb
3.0- Braces and supports for Back and neck
4.0- Podiatry products
5.0- Hot and Cold therapy products
6.0- Acupuncture products
7.0- Measurement and testing products
8.0- Products for Exercise and posture
9.0- Supporting consumables for use with Electro-medical physiotherapy equipment
10.0- Models and charts for Education and training
11.0- Do you provide consumables for any category not mentioned previously (if yes please detail)?
11.1- For these categories are you a manufacturer, distributor or both?
11.2- What are the main brands you can provide within these categories?
11.3- Are you sole distributors in UK for some of these brands?
III- Capital equipment.
Please confirm if you supply the following:
12.0- Podiatry equipment
13.0- Hot and Cold therapy equipment
14.0- Equipment for measurement and assessment
15.0- Equipment for treatment couches and plinths
16.0- Equipment for exercise therapy
17.0- Physiotherapy equipment
18.0- Acupuncture equipment
19.0- Do you provide any physio and rehabilitation equipment for any category not mentioned previously (if yes please detail)?
19.1- For these categories are you a manufacturer, distributor or both?
19.2- What are the main brands you can provide within these categories?
19.3- Are you sole distributors in UK for some of these brands?
19.4- Can you provide consumables or spares that go with this equipment?
19.5- If required by the equipment, can you provide maintenance?
IV- Company capabilities.
20.0- Are you currently providing these products in UK? Elsewhere in the Public sector? (If so please detail where possible)
20.1- What is your average lead time on consumables?
20.2- Do you impose minimum order quantities? If so, why?
20.3- Are your products CE certified?
20.4- Where would you hold the stock?
20.5- For consumables, can you provide samples at tender stage to perform tests?

INFO_ADD.P: Please request a Microsoft word version of the questionnaire from the named Contact in this bulletin.
